<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202740</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Trashketball Review for ratios, fractions, decimals and percents.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trashketball Zusammenfassung für Verhältnisse, 
Brüche, Dezimalstriche und Prozente.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Revue de Trashketball pour des taux, des 
fractions, des décimales et des pour cent.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Revisão de Trashketball para relações, 
frações, decimais e por cento.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rassegna di Trashketball per i rapporti, le 
frazioni, i decimali ed i percento.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναθεώρηση Trashketball για τις αναλογίες, μέρη, 
δεκαδικά και percents.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Revisión de Trashketball para las relaciones de 
transformación, las fracciones, los decimales y los por ciento.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will help the students with changing from ratios to fractions, fractions to decimals, and decimals to percents.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion hilft den Kursteilnehmern mit dem Ändern 
von Verhältnisse zu Brüche, Brüche zu den Dezimalstrichen und 
Dezimalstriche zu den Prozenten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon aidera les étudiants avec changer des taux 
aux fractions, aux fractions aux décimales, et aux décimales aux 
pour cent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição ajudará aos estudantes com mudança das 
relações às frações, às frações aos decimais, e aos decimais 
aos por cento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione aiuterà gli allievi con cambiare dai 
rapporti alle frazioni, alle frazioni ai decimali ed ai decimali ai 
percento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές με την 
αλλαγή από τις αναλογίες στα μέρη, μέρη στα δεκαδικά, και τα 
δεκαδικά στα percents.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección ayudará a los estudiantes con cambiar de 
relaciones de transformación a las fracciones, a las fracciones a los
decimales, y a los decimales a los por ciento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        </lifeCycle>

        </educational>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/trashketball-review-for-ratios-fractions-decimals-and-percents</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
